title: Cyberware list
description: Cyberware list for Cyberpunk 2020 including prices, surgery time, humanity and description.
author: Hendo

nu_tek_tvskin.name: Nu-Tek TVSkin
nu_tek_tvskin.description: Your skin can become a vidscreen

unusual_colorization.name: Unusual Colorization
unusual_colorization.description: +2000eb if already attached to body = Price per inch

custom_cyberware.name: Custom Cyberware
custom_cyberware.description: Modified cyberware | Price is 4x the base value

NeuralWare.Description: Processor connected the lower spine to route signals from external cyberwear to centralervous system. It is thein System for any type ofeural interface.

neuralware_processor.name: Neuralware Processor
neuralware_processor.description: Basic processor.ust have for all systems

kerenzikov_boosterware.name: Kerenzikov Boosterware
kerenzikov_boosterware.description: +1 to Initiative for every level up to +2

pain_editor.name: Pain Editor
pain_editor.description: Allows Endurance checks at 2 diff levels lower

cybermodem_link.name: Cybermodem Link
cybermodem_link.description: Allows direct connection to a cybermodem

cyberaudio_link.name: Cyberaudio Link
cyberaudio_link.description: Allows direct connection to a cyberaudio

interface_plugs.name: Interface Plugs
interface_plugs.description: Allows direct connection to smartguns, etc.

mag_duct_spots.name: Mag-Duct Spots
mag_duct_spots.description: As interface plugs, but only a +1 bonus.

tactile_boost_linkage.name: Tactile Boost Linkage
tactile_boost_linkage.description: Links Tactile Boost to Sexual Implant (addictive)

pacemaker_coprocessor.name: Pacemaker Coprocessor
pacemaker_coprocessor.description: Restarts heart when attacked by ICE

super_compact_braindance.name: Super Compact Braindance
super_compact_braindance.description: Braindance recorder that fits on back of head

model_100_plugs.name: Model 100 Plugs
model_100_plugs.description: +2 vs Black Ice, -2 for anything else

echolocation_system.name: Echolocation System
echolocation_system.description: Can see in complete darkness, -1 Awareness

boostmaster.name: Boostmaster
boostmaster.description: +1 REF with both types of boosterware

braindance_plugs.name: Braindance Plugs
braindance_plugs.description: Allows direct connection to Braindance recorder

positronic_enhancer.name: Positronic Enhancer
positronic_enhancer.description: +2 to INT, 10% chance of overload and fits

braindance_apdaptor.name: Braindance Apdaptor
braindance_apdaptor.description: Allows chipware socket to run Braindance

wirehead_unit.name: Wirehead Unit
wirehead_unit.description: Stimulates the pleasure centres of the brain

gills_fresh_water.name: Gills (Fresh water)
gills_fresh_water.description: Water breathing system, good for 4 hours

saltwater_gills.name: Saltwater Gills
saltwater_gills.description: Saltwater breathing system, good for 4 hours

mr_studd.name: Mr Studd
mr_studd.description: Sexual implant. Allight, everyight. +1 to Seduction checks

subdermal_pocket.name: Subdermal Pocket
subdermal_pocket.description: 2"x4" space with Realskinn zipper. Diff to spot

subdermal_armor.name: Subdermal Armor
subdermal_armor.description: Armors torso to SP 18. Diff Awareness to spot

subdermal_torso_armour.name: Subdermal Torso Armour
subdermal_torso_armour.description: 6-22 SP, Imp-Easy to spot, REF/ATTR loss

military_sonar.name: Military Sonar
military_sonar.description: 50m range. For water only. 95% effective. Avail P.

t_maxx2_cyberliver.name: T-Maxx 2 Cyberliver
t_maxx2_cyberliver.description: As above but with fluid rerouting system.

decentralized_heart.name: Decentralized Heart
decentralized_heart.description: +2 to Death Saves for Torso wounds.

e_monitor.name: E-Monitor
e_monitor.description: Detects changes in pressure and air.

optishield.name: OptiShield
optishield.description: Anti-Dazzle, SP8, 2 spaces for optic options.

optishield_options.name: OptiShield Options
optishield_options.description: T2, T2+, TE, LL, IR, Time/day.

variable_chambered_heart.name: Variable-Chambered Heart
variable_chambered_heart.description: Cyberheart option, x2 hold breath, +1 Endurance.

autoinjector.name: Autoinjector
autoinjector.description: Holds 5 doses, +200eb to wire to Biomonitor.

endo_frame_basic.name: Endo-Frame (Basic)
endo_frame_basic.description: SCR BOD+3, +1 HH dam, 10 points/limb, EV +1.

gpsodule.name: GPSodule
gpsodule.description: Determine position to 17cm.eeds T2 or T2+.

gpsodule_screen.name: GPSodule w/screen
gpsodule_screen.description: As above but with subdermal viewscreen.

enhanced_lungs_series3x2.name: Enhanced Lungs Series 3x2
enhanced_lungs_series3x2.description: Entire lungs replaced. Good down to 1000m.

strobe_m.name: Strobe,M
strobe_m.description: Blind for 1D6 hours. Option for flashlite.

dakai_cyphire_new_throat.name: Dakai/Cyphire New Throat
dakai_cyphire_new_throat.description: Hold 3 implants/options at 1/4 Eb, 0 HC, 15 SDP

voice_pattern.name: Voice Pattern
voice_pattern.description: A Vox/NT option, allows voice pattern emulation

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: Whisper to megaphone, deaf for 1D6 turns, 5m

grafted_muscle.name: Grafted Muscle
grafted_muscle.description: +1 increase to BODY, max increase is +2

skin_weave.name: Skin Weave
skin_weave.description: Armors whole body to SP 12. Difficult to spot.

upgraded_skinweave.name: Upgraded Skinweave
upgraded_skinweave.description: 6 to 16 SP, ATTR loss, Imp to Av to spot.

enhanced_antibodies.name: Enhanced Antibodies
enhanced_antibodies.description: Improves Healing by +1 point per day.

alpha_tuffbone_skeletal_enh.name: Alpha TuffBone Skeletal Enh
alpha_tuffbone_skeletal_enh.description: +1 for lift, carry, BTM vs HH/Melee

beta_tuffbone_skeletal_enh.name: Beta TuffBone Skeletal Enh
beta_tuffbone_skeletal_enh.description: +2 for lift, carry, BTM vs HH/Melee, ATT -1

sunblocker_sunscreen.name: Sunblocker Sunscreen
sunblocker_sunscreen.description: Prevents sunburn, reduces skin cancer risk

neolungs.name: NeoLungs
neolungs.description: Hold breath twice as long as normal

neural_bridge.name: Neural Bridge
neural_bridge.description: Ambidexterity, no penalty with off hand

circulatory_sphincters.name: Circulatory Sphincters
circulatory_sphincters.description: +2 to Stun/Shock Saves after a Serious+ wound

poison_glands_teeth.name: Poison Glands-Teeth
poison_glands_teeth.description: Natural fangs that inject poison when you bite

poison_glands_teeth_i.name: Poison Glands-Teeth / Ilegal
poison_glands_teeth_i.description: Natural fangs that inject poison when you bite

poison_glands_hands.name: Poison Glands-Hands
poison_glands_hands.description: Can be used to coat Rippers or Wolvers

poison_glands_hands_i.name: Poison Glands-Hands / Ilegal
poison_glands_hands_i.description: Can be used to coat Rippers or Wolvers

quickclot_hemofibrinic_node.name: Quickclot Hemofibrinic Node
quickclot_hemofibrinic_node.description: Wound states treated as one less, 10% stroke

replitech_toxin_screen.name: Replitech Toxin Screen
replitech_toxin_screen.description: 90% chance of vomiting if toxins are eaten

diet_mite.name: Diet-Mite
diet_mite.description: Screens what you eat passing on what's needed

altered_dna.name: Altered DNA
altered_dna.description: DNA altered using a tailored retrovirus

ihag_nictating_membrane.name: IHAG Nictating Membrane
ihag_nictating_membrane.description: Can see in difficult conditions. Replace 6-8 mth

nanowear_ozoneshield.name: Nanowear Ozoneshield
nanowear_ozoneshield.description: Modification of Skin Weave, protects against UV

toughened_skin.name: Toughened Skin
toughened_skin.description: SP6 Soft Armor, can't be told from normal skin.

endurance.name: Endurance
endurance.description: Ignore fatigue 12 hrs, x2 food, 1D3-1D6 damage

ignore_pain.name: Ignore Pain
ignore_pain.description: +4 to Stun Saves for 12 hours, -2 tactile sense

skill_1.name: Skill +1
skill_1.description: Lasts for 3 hours, 1D10>1 or -1 in skill

skill_2.name: Skill +2
skill_2.description: Lasts for 3 hours, 1D10>2 or -1 in skill

skill_3.name: Skill +3
skill_3.description: Lasts for 3 hours, 1D10>3 or -1 in skill

scratchers.name: Scratchers
scratchers.description: Hands. 1D6/3* damage. Near Impossible to spot

newteeth.name: NewTeeth
newteeth.description: Ceramic teeth: MEL -1 NA C 1-2pts NA 1 VR

powerjaw.name: PowerJaw
powerjaw.description: Myomer jaw muscles, +2 to bite damage

bigripp.name: BigRipp
bigripp.description: 2D6* damage (break on 1 or 1-3 on a parry)

mandibles.name: Mandibles
mandibles.description: 2D6 damage bite, look normal except for eating

cyberjaw.name: Cyberjaw
cyberjaw.description: SP 6 metal jaw. 1D6* to 3D6* bite damage.

cyberoptic.name: CYBEROPTIC
cyberoptic.description: Basic eye module (4 option spaces per eye)

soviet_cyberoptic.name: Soviet Cyberoptic
soviet_cyberoptic.description: 1 option space per eye, 50% chance of -1 ATTR

color_shift.name: Color Shift
color_shift.description: Allows color changes, special fashion effects

times_square_marquee.name: Times Square Marquee
times_square_marquee.description: LED Screen in vision field for messages

low_lite.name: Low Lite
low_lite.description: See in dim light, almost total darkness

infrared.name: Infrared
infrared.description: See in total darkness, using heat emissions

ultraviolet.name: Ultraviolet
ultraviolet.description: See in darkness, using UV flash

microvideo_optic.name: MicroVideo Optic
microvideo_optic.description: Video record up to 20 min (2 spaces)

dodgeball.name: Dodgeball
dodgeball.description: +1 to Hand to Hand skill after 30 secs

laser_comm_optic.name: Laser-Comm Optic
laser_comm_optic.description: 50m range, and can blind. Code chips are 175eb

double_slit_pupils.name: Double-Slit Pupils
double_slit_pupils.description: Allows clear vision through air-water boundary (1)

cyberoptic_eyepatch.name: Cyberoptic Eyepatch
cyberoptic_eyepatch.description: 2 options. Diff. Awareness to spot what it is

soviet_cyberaudio.name: Soviet Cyberaudio
soviet_cyberaudio.description: Only 2 option spaces, 50% chance of -1 ATTR

scrambler.name: Scrambler
scrambler.description: Cannot understand with out a descrambler

bug_detector.name: Bug Detector
bug_detector.description: Detects taps, bugs up to 3m. 60% effective

enhanced_hearing_range.name: Enhanced Hearing Range
enhanced_hearing_range.description: Ability to hear supersonic, subsonic ranges

radar_detector.name: Radar Detector
radar_detector.description: Beeps if radar encountered, fixes source (40%)

homing_tracer.name: Homing Tracer
homing_tracer.description: Can follow tracer up to 1Km distant

tight_beam_radio_link.name: Tight Beam Radio Link
tight_beam_radio_link.description: Allows untappable radio com within line of sight

wide_band_radio_scanner.name: Wide Band Radio Scanner
wide_band_radio_scanner.description: Picks up transmissions on all bands

micro_recorder_link.name: Micro-recorder Link
micro_recorder_link.description: Transmits to recorder in body or via plugs

digital_recording_link.name: Digital Recording Link
digital_recording_link.description: Transmits sounds to a digital recorder

artificial_shoulder_mount.name: Artificial Shoulder Mount
artificial_shoulder_mount.description: Mount up to 2 extra arms. 25 SDP

speeding_bullet_legs.name: Speeding Bullet Legs
speeding_bullet_legs.description: MA 16, leap 10m, 1 option space left per leg

tentacle_arm.name: Tentacle Arm
tentacle_arm.description: 8x70 cm tentacles, SDP 5 ea. SDP20 shoulder

extendable_tentacle_arm.name: Extendable Tentacle Arm
extendable_tentacle_arm.description: Same as acima plus can extend to 150 cm

fleshweave.name: Fleshweave
fleshweave.description: Takes 1 option space. +50% repair prices | Price: +20%

extra_twist_joint_addition.name: Extra Twist Joint Addition
extra_twist_joint_addition.description: +2 Athletic type rolls, MArt Grapples & Escapes | Price: +30%

rotating_joints_360.name: 360 Rotating Joints
rotating_joints_360.description: +1 to Escaping, some TECH repairs (0.5 spaces)

tool_hand.name: Tool Hand
tool_hand.description: Fingers contain screwdriver, wrench, drill, etc

cyberhand_coverings.name: Cyberhand Coverings
cyberhand_coverings.description: Same range as listed in for cyberlimbs

tool_foot.name: Tool Foot
tool_foot.description: Toes contain screwdriver, wrench, drill, etc

web_foot.name: Web Foot
web_foot.description: Doubles swimming speed, +3 to Swim skill

grip_foot.name: Grip Foot
grip_foot.description: For better gripping strength. +2 to Climb

spike_heel_foot.name: Spike Heel Foot
spike_heel_foot.description: Heel spike for lethal kicks. 2D6AP damage

skate_foot.name: Skate Foot
skate_foot.description: Allows an MA 20. Use Athletics or skate skill

anchoring_cyberfeet.name: Anchoring Cyberfeet
anchoring_cyberfeet.description: Anchors use to ground. 4 uses (2 spaces each)

flasher.name: Flasher
flasher.description: Diff REF to blind target for 1 min (25eb)

flesh_mount.name: Flesh Mount
flesh_mount.description: Allows cyberfingers to be mounted on meat hand

digital_recorder.name: Digital Recorder
digital_recorder.description: Digital chip recorder. Download or erase chip

hidden_holster.name: Hidden Holster
hidden_holster.description: Weapon size based on Body Type

lcd_screen_readout.name: LCD Screen Readout
lcd_screen_readout.description: Can be linked to any output device

quickdraw_holster.name: Quickdraw Holster
quickdraw_holster.description: P class conc. +2 Initiative to fastdraw

radio_phone_station.name: Radio-Phone Station
radio_phone_station.description: Runs for 160 hours on a charge (2 spaces)

cyberlimb_light.name: Cyberlimb light
cyberlimb_light.description: Light built into palm, 3m range (0 spaces)

popup_gun.name: Popup Gun
popup_gun.description: Gun size based on Body Type | Variso prices between 2-800eb

weapon_mount_link.name: Weapon Mount & Link
weapon_mount_link.description: Mounting plate plus neural link for 1 weapon

front_optic_mount.name: Front Optic Mount
front_optic_mount.description: Allows up to 5 optics to be mounted. -1 ATTR

sense_ext_rabbit_ears.description: Head mounted extensors for audio, optics, etc

interchangeable_bipod.name: Interchangeable Bipod
interchangeable_bipod.description: Organs can be moved to different FBRs

cyber_steroids.name: Cyber Steriods
cyber_steroids.description: BODx3, +3kg/+1 BOD, runs off power unit below

reactive_body_plating.name: Reactive Body Plating
reactive_body_plating.description: Detects laser & smart sights, REF>10 dodge

minor_facial_modification.name: Minor Facial Modification
minor_facial_modification.description: Alterations to eyes, ears, nose, etc

muzzle_short.name: Muzzle, Short
muzzle_short.description: Like a bear's or tiger's muzzle

muzzle_long.name: Muzzle, Long
muzzle_long.description: Like a dog's or horse's muzzle

scratchers.name: Scratchers
scratchers.description: Low HL due to implantation in hospital

rippers.name: Rippers
rippers.description: Low HL due to implantation in hospital

tail.name: Tail
tail.description: Mobile but weak, exerts about 3lbs of force

digitgrade_legs.name: Digitgrade Legs
digitgrade_legs.description: 3 joint legs. +1 MA with tail. -2 MA without tail

exoskeleton.name: ExoSkeleton
exoskeleton.description: SP 18, MA & REF-2. 10% chance of cancer

frame_alteration.name: Frame Alteration
frame_alteration.description: 25% size change from actual body size

muscle_pouch.name: Muscle Pouch
muscle_pouch.description: Muscles on lower back for tails or tentacles

katnip_feline.name: KatNip - Feline
katnip_feline.description: Slit-eyes, pointed ears, tail, synthskin, scratchers

rodent.name: Rodent
rodent.description: Enlarged ears and eyes, button nose, synthskin

rabbit.name: Rabbit
rabbit.description: Bunny ears & tail, button nose, whiskers

reptile.name: Reptile
reptile.description: No ears, long tongue, olfactory, fangs, synthskin

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Pointed ears, thin face, upturned eyebrows

ork_goblin.name: Ork/Goblin
ork_goblin.description: Broad features, longer arms, fangs, synthskin

troll_ogre.name: Troll/Ogre
troll_ogre.description: Broad features, fangs, taller, grafted muscle, MBL

zark_nartanq_graftable.name: Zark Nartanq Graftable
zark_nartanq_graftable.description: Fangs, wolvers, tail, skinweave, MBL, etc

bear_package.name: Bear Package
bear_package.description: Muzzle, fangs, claws, fur, taller, grafted muscle

the_superman.name: The Superman
the_superman.description: The future of humanity via nano and bioware

bigkatt.name: BigKatt
bigkatt.description: Muzzle, fangs, claws, tail, digitigrade legs, fur

merman.name: Merman
merman.description: Gills, skinchange, fishtail, cust. contacts, sonar

sharkman.name: Sharkman
sharkman.description: Gills, sonar, skinweave & change, muzzle, etc

lupaform_minor_package.name: LupaForm Minor Package
lupaform_minor_package.description: Pointed ears, dog-nose & eyes, fangs, synthskin

lupaform_major_package.name: LupaForm Major Package
lupaform_major_package.description: as acima, + muzzle, tail, digitgrade legs, fur

playbeing_addition.name: Playbeing Addition
playbeing_addition.description: Increased ATT, tactile boost, behavior chip, etc

aptr_reflex_chips.name: APTR Reflex Chips
aptr_reflex_chips.description: Chips reflex and tech based skills

mram_memory_chips.name: MRAM Memory Chips
mram_memory_chips.description: Chips INT and other cognitive skills

mo_chips.name: M.O. Chips
mo_chips.description: One yes/no answer for INT 15+ roll

digi_tone_id.name: Digi-Tone ID
digi_tone_id.description: Used with cyberaudio to recognise phone no.

special_operative_chip.name: Special Operative Chip
special_operative_chip.description: +1 Language, Geography, and one other skill

photomemory_ram_chip.name: PhotoMemory RAM Chip
photomemory_ram_chip.description: INT roll +2 [15+] to get a specific memory

programmable_chipware.name: Programmable Chipware
programmable_chipware.description: Provides basic knowledge of a procedure

business_trip_chip.name: Business Trip Chip
business_trip_chip.description: +1 Language, Culture, W/S or Business Law

increased_neural_feedback.name: Increased Neural Feedback
increased_neural_feedback.description: 1/2 time to 'chip in', burns out in 24 hours

independent_action_chip.name: Independent Action Chip
independent_action_chip.description: Independent action for each arm. Amb+2 optics

deathtrance.name: DeathTrance
deathtrance.description: 1-3 minutes to enter. Medtech 25+ to detect life

redundancy_loop.name: Redundancy Loop
redundancy_loop.description: Will screw up at a crucial moment 50-75%

police_visual_rec_chip.name: Police Visual Rec Chip
police_visual_rec_chip.description: Visual ID's on criminals and licenses

somaware_sleep_chip.name: SomaWare Sleep Chip
somaware_sleep_chip.description: Normal sleep (after 15 uses COOL 15+ to sleep)

navigation_orientation_chip.name: Navigation/Orientation Chip
navigation_orientation_chip.description: Requires Phone Splice/Radio Link, accurate to 5m

major_city_map.name: Major City Map
major_city_map.description: Contour map, needs Video Imager/Subd Screen

auditory_recognition_chips.name: Auditory Recognition Chips
auditory_recognition_chips.description: Require Amp Hearing and Sound Edit (max +2)

sunny_day.name: Sunny Day
sunny_day.description: Makes you feel happy, +4 vs Intimidation
